title: Elementary Chinese I
description: Performance-based training in pronunciation, tones, and sentence structure, developing a baseline for listening, speaking, reading, and writing Chinese, as well as fostering a sensitivity to Chinese culture.  Humanities credit awarded for CHIN 1001 upon successful completion of CHIN 1002 or CHIN 2001.
